title: How To Make a Static Website

metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: How TO - Make a Static Website
A static website has fixed content
content.html: A static website has fixed content

content.text: It does not require programming languages to build one.
content.html: It does not require programming languages to build one.

content.text: It is the easiest form of website to create.
content.html: It is the easiest form of website to create.

content.text: Static websites are build of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
content.html: Static websites are build of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

content.text: Why create a static website?
Static websites are quick and easy to create.
content.html: Static websites are quick and easy to create.

content.text: It is cheap to host.
content.html: It is cheap to host.

content.text: Static websites are secure.
content.html: Static websites are secure.

content.text: It is fun and you can create awesome sites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
content.html: It is fun and you can create awesome sites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

content.text: What do I need to know to build a static website
HTML, CSS and JavaScript are the basic languages to build any website.
content.html: HTML, CSS and JavaScript are the basic languages to build any website.

content.text: The best way to learn is to get practical. Start building today!
content.html: The best way to learn is to get practical. Start building today!

content.text: Create a static website with W3Schools Spaces
Spaces is a personal place where you can build and experiment with code and host your website.
content.html: Spaces is a personal place where you can build and experiment with code and host your website.

content.text: With Spaces you can build static sites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
content.html: With Spaces you can build static sites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

content.text: Everything you need right in the browser.
content.html: Everything you need right in the browser.

content.text: How do I get started
There are two ways to start building a static website.
content.html: There are two ways to start building a static website.

content.text: Building from scratch or using a template .
content.html: Building from scratch or using a template.

content.text: Building a static webpage from scratch
Read here for how to create a static website from scratch How to Create a Webpage
content.html: Read here for how to create a static website from scratch How to Create a Webpage

content.text: Building with a template
Starting with templates is a good way to get inspired and to learn.
content.html: Starting with templates is a good way to get inspired and to learn.

content.html: We have ready-made templates that you can use. Here are some examples:

content.html: There are many static website templates available in W3Schools Spaces. They can be loaded directly into the service.
